title: Encourage a Friend
description: Send a verse or a kind word to someone who needs it. Sharing from the devotional page counts!

title: 5-Minute Prayer
description: Set aside five minutes for focused, intentional prayer. You can use a prayer from the app or your own.

title: Journal on a New Verse
description: Generate a devotional for a new verse and write a journal entry about it.

title: Pray for Others
description: Visit the anonymous Prayer Wall and pray for three requests from the community.

title: Complete a Challenge Day
description: Make progress in one of your active spiritual challenges by completing a day's task.

title: Share a Favorite
description: Share one of your favorited verses with someone.

title: Take a Quiz
description: Test your knowledge by taking any quiz.
